attributes.action: Reconsider the recent bans on porn production
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/uk-porn-legislation-what-is-now-banned-under-new-government-laws-9898541.html

The new bans are bizarre, unnecessary, sexist, harmful to the porn industry, and did not go through with any kind of vote or general consent and should therefore be reconsidered.
